name: MEOWgic Treasure
description:
MEOWgic Treasure  is a 2-4 player local multiplayer game where four meowgical adventurers compete to make their dreams come true! Collect meowgical orbs found around the level, once you have enough orbs rush to the treasure chest to win! But beware! Other cats can attack you to steal your orbs!

The game is built for Windows 10 and supports xbox 360 and xbox one controllers. Controllers are required for play! Game was not tested with other controllers, sorry!

MEOWgic Treasure was made in  by Nik and Ami for fun and learning! If you find any bugs please let us know!

Art by Ami Moore -- amillustration.com
Unity stuff by Nik Odic -- odicart.com
Made in Unity 2017 using Playmaker. 
Background Music by PlayOnLoop.com Licensed under Creative Commons By Attribution 4.0
Sound effects made in Bfxr.net
Cat voices recorded by Nik and Ami
